archimate:Deliverable.name: ServiceNow Asset discovery updated to reflect the needs of Vulnerability Management
archimate:Deliverable.documentation:
Discovery solution needs to be updated so that the data, which will end up on CMDB / Data Management contains the information required by Vulnerability Management.
A simple example could be for example operation system version in order to asses whatever the new 0-day vulnerability affecting Windows Version 10.0.22621 Build 22621 is affected.
Another example is the applications running on the Windows, for example Firefox version xyz or Oracle database version abc. This information needs to be available on asset database
